name: BIRD BALL
description:
BIRD BALL!!! You scream out and all your friends rush to their computers to fire up the next big thing in online multiplayer video game entertainment.

Play as a stork, a goose or is it a flamingo? Who knows. But one things certain, it's a bird and there's a ball that needs kickin'

Play with friends as you rush to score as many goals as possible, or simply mess about in the playground.
You could always just play alone though and if you get lonely spawn in some new bird friends via the patented "Bird Dispensers"!

Customise your bird with a name and a colour, colours are chosen by a number you provide - what colour bird could you discover? Could you be the one that finds the fabled GOLD BIRD? Anything is possible in the world of BIRD BALL!!! (Exclamation points are not part of the title, but should be included whenever referencing the game).

Expect to see in BIRD BALL right now:
  • Up to 10 player multiplayer
  • Choice of AI team members or opponents
  • Secret achievements
  • Chose your bird colour
  • Socialise in the world of BIRD BALL with your friends
  • Physics sandbox interactions


Roadmap (planned free updates):
  • Collectables in an expanded map
  • Tag game mode
  • Hide and seek game mode
  • Customisables for your bird
